resources.string: The aim of this application is to allow the students of the University of the West Indies Mona Campus to better navigate their way around the campus. This is done by providing the students directions to their classes or where ever they wish to be. The application uses the Google Maps API,the gps capabilities of your device and works by finding the closest building to your current location on the University campus. Once this closest point is found it plots you a step by step path to your desired destination.

This software is available free on the Google Play Store and is provided "AS IS". With this software there are no warranties expressed or implied,therefore all related purpose are hereunder disclaimed. In no time and in no event Keefe Inc will be liable for any damages, including but not limited to direct or indirect, special or consequencial damages arising out of, resulting from, or in any way connected with this software, whether or not based upon warranty, contract, or otherwise, whether or not injury was sustained by persons or property or otherwise and weather or not loss was sustained from, or arose out of the results or use of, the software or services provided hereunder.
1. Press the menu button at the top left hand corner of the screen to slide the navigation draw out.
2. You can also swipe from left to right of the screen to slide drawer out.
3. Search through the list of spots on campus and select where you want to go.
*. For best results this application should be used on campus.
